name: 1847: Underwater Threat
description:
Fight the Alien Mothership and save the human race! But remember to breathe!

Use the arrow keys or the left stick to move and space or A to shoot.

Code and Art: Desmazio (my first game!)

Fight music: "Battle in the Winter" by Johan Brodd

Menu music: "Underwater" by Cleyton Kauffman

Game made in 3 days for the 33th edition of Mini Jam.
